perturbation.original_text:
1.1 Definitions

"Affiliate" means, with respect to any person, any other person directly or indirectly, through one or more intermediaries, Controlling, Controlled by or under common Control with such person and, in the case of a trust, any trustee or beneficiary (actual or potential) of that trust and, in the case of an individual, any person connected with him; provided that, for the purposes of this Agreement, neither QIWI nor any of its subsidiaries is to be regarded as an Affiliate of Otkritie;
perturbation.changed_text:
1.1 Definitions

"Affiliate" means, with respect to any person, any other person directly or indirectly, through one or more intermediaries, Controlling, Controlled by or under common Control with such person and, in the case of a trust, any trustee or beneficiary (actual or potential) of that trust and, in the case of an individual, any person connected with him;
perturbation.explanation: The removal of the clause 'provided that, for the purposes of this Agreement, neither QIWI nor any of its subsidiaries is to be regarded as an Affiliate of Otkritie;' creates a contradiction. Later clauses might rely on this exclusion, and without it, QIWI and its subsidiaries could be considered Affiliates of Otkritie, leading to unforeseen legal and financial implications.

perturbation.original_text:
3.2 The Steering Committee shall consist of three representatives of QIWI Group and three representatives of Otkritie (each, a "Committee Member"). The representatives shall include:

 (a) at least one representative from Otkritie occupying the position of Chief Executive Officer or the Chairman of the Management Board orsimilar within Otkritie Holding JSC, PJSC Khanty-Mansiysk Bank Otkritie or JSC Bank Otkritie Financial Corporation; and

 (b) QIWI's Chief Executive Officer.

Each of Otkritie and QIWI Group shall have the exclusive right to remove and replace any of its designees to the Steering Committee at any time by notice to the other party.
perturbation.changed_text: 3.2 The Steering Committee shall consist of three representatives of QIWI Group and three representatives of Otkritie (each, a "Committee Member"). Each of Otkritie and QIWI Group shall have the exclusive right to remove and replace any of its designees to the Steering Committee at any time by notice to the other party.
perturbation.explanation: By removing the specification of required representatives like the CEO, the effectiveness of the Steering Committee is reduced. Later clauses still refer to the 'Committee Member', but now, there is no required position to be part of the committee. This omission contradicts the original intention of having specific high-level representatives present for strategic cooperation.

Removing clause (b) 'for the avoidance of doubt, must not be sent by electronic mail;' introduces ambiguity and a potential contradiction. If other sections of the contract implicitly accept electronic communication, the absence of this explicit prohibition opens the door to disputes about acceptable means of communication. The contract refers to notices, but removing the negative constraint generates a lot of potential issues.
